bill.title: Father Mychal Judge, O.F.M., Congressional Gold Medal Act

subjects.subject: Arts, culture, religion

bill.summary: 3/10/2011--Introduced. Father Mychal Judge, O.F.M., Congressional Gold Medal Act - Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate to arrange for the presentation, on behalf of Congress, of a gold medal to the next of kin or personal representative of Father Mychal Judge, O.F.M., in recognition of his example to the nation of selfless dedication to duty and compassion for one's fellow citizens.
